name: Lisa
desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>July 19, 2019</color>
"There'll be time for this later... Come sit and chat with me."
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1152216541125120000</color>

<color=#ffd780>January 7, 2023</color>
In Version 3.4, you will be able to get Lisa's brand-new outfit "A Sobriquet Under Shade" for free by participating in the limited-time "Second Blooming" event. Let's check it out together!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/14868352</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2020</color>
Oh, cutie, you're here. Come, sit.
How would you like to join me for some tea today?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/13228</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2021</color>
Oh, hello there, cutie! Right on time.
I'm just about to have some afternoon tea, come join me.
Is that... a birthday present for me?
In this case, I will prepare some special tea time snacks just for you.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/421492</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2021</color>
"Now that I've collected all the overdue books, I wonder what delicious snacks Lisa has prepared? Come to think of it, she seems to be awfully fond of afternoon tea."
"I heard that the most important part of Lisa's day is a relaxing and pleasant afternoon tea session! Hey, Paimon, slow down! Wait for me—"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/421493</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2022</color>
Hey cutie, what brings you here?
Oh, these... are herbs that you don't come across every day in Mondstadt.
Thank you, cutie. Seems like you know exactly how to delight me~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5314741</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2022</color>
Hello, cutie, it's been a while~ What brought you here today?
If it's about work, then that's too bad, because I don't intend to work overtime today.
But looking at the flowers you're holding... Hehe, I think I know what's going on.
Well, why are you standing there? Come and enjoy afternoon tea with me~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5314744</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2023</color>
Oh my, you not only returned your books on time, you even brought me a present. You are a clever little cutie, aren't you?
In that case, allow me to congratulate you on becoming the "Reader of the Month" in my heart. This is an exclusive honor reserved only for little cuties who support my work~
As for the prize... Now, is there anything at all you want from me, cutie? Take your time thinking about it, we have all the time in the world~
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19202695</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2023</color>
"Dear Miss Lisa,
I hope this letter isn't too late. Happy Birthday to you!
From Collei"
"Mmm, she really is quite the little cutie."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/19202697</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2024</color>
"Miss Lisa, here are today's herbs! A—And... Happy Birthday."
"Oh, thank you. You look beautiful today, sweetie."
"Th—Thank you!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/29699495</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 9, 2024</color>
Hmm, what's this? A book on making snacks... Hehe, seems like you've been here, cutie.
It's this late already? Oopsie, I must've overslept during my nap today~
You know what? I'm actually feeling a bit hungry now. How about we follow the instructions on this page and make some snacks?
—So, how long do you plan to hide behind that window, cuties? How could you bear to watch me prepare my own birthday snacks all by myself, hmm?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/29699497</color>

<color=#ffd780>June 14, 2019</color>
There'll always be peace under the wings of the Knights of Favonius, as long as you are in the wind.
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1139533292338913281</color>

<color=#ffd780>October 31, 2019</color>
Cape, bat, and pumpkin lantern. The Rose Witch is off~
Candy, candles and slimes! Enjoy the Halloween fun~
"The cathedral entrance is not for such revelry!"
—Did someone just say something? Or am I just hearing things...?
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1189859595650506752</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 23, 2020</color>
5 days until the global release of Genshin Impact on the PlayStation®4, iOS, Android, and PC platforms.
Travelers, are your ready?
Your journey of exploration across worlds is about to begin!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17211</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 28, 2020</color>
<color=#ece5d8>[Translated from Japanese]</color>
[To celebrate the official release! Twitter icons distributed!]
To commemorate the official release, we will be distributing Twitter icons!
Please use it!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Genshin_7/status/1310425266129305606</color>

<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2021</color>
Today's Jean's birthday, and the Knights of Favonius have secretly prepared a full spread of fine dishes for her, just to celebrate the special occasion!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/242665</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 27, 2021</color>
whispering "Traveler, the place Amber said where they buried the treasure should be right in front. I wonder what kind of gift the other Knights prepared?"
"Klee, let the treasure hunt challenge begin! Let's see who can find the treasure first! Wait, be careful, don't fall—"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/606963</color>

<color=#ffd780>September 9, 2023</color>
"Many gifts... From teacher Lisa... and everyone..."
"What is this... warm... feeling? Thank you."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/21513411</color>

<color=#ffd780>November 20, 2024</color>
Thanks to @JDD7 for the amazing work!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/Paimon2theMoon/status/1859129555119673447</color>
Genshin Impact x HoYoQuiz USA Quiz Show

<color=#ffd780>September 9, 2022</color>
Dear Travelers,
join Paimon in the final match of the "Genshin Impact X HoYoQuiz USA Quiz Show"!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1568252906276618240</color>

desc.text:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#ffd780>Violet Arc</color> .
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

Holding <color=#ffd780>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:
·Increases DEF by 25%.
·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=#ffd780>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Violet Arc</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#ffd780>Violet Arc</color> 's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

The librarian of the Knights of Favonius. In addition to her elegance and charm, Lisa is also highly educated.
She is said to have been the most talented sorceress to study at the Sumeru Akademiya in the last two centuries.
It is known that Lisa chose to return to Mondstadt after two years of advanced study in Sumeru, but the reason for her decision is not.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
Lisa is tasked with managing and maintaining the vast collection of books in the Knights of Favonius library, as well as ensuring that their potions are always fully stocked.
The only time that the citizens of Mondstadt see Lisa is when lending or returning library books.
In both scenarios, they tend to encounter Lisa sitting at the counter like a languid cat, yawning as she signs books in and out.
At times, her behavior causes people to doubt whether she is really up to the task of being librarian for the illustrious Knights of Favonius.
Nevertheless, it appears that she performs every task flawlessly, as her work consistently stands up to scrutiny.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
The fact that Cyrus of the Sumeru Akademiya frequently refers to Lisa as their "best student in two hundred years" is all that needs to be said about Lisa's accomplishments in her studies.
From outlandish forbidden knowledge, to the handling of elementally infused flora, to the most efficient methods of distilling wine... where there is a body of knowledge, the chances are that Lisa is acquainted with it.
This, paired with her ability to explain things clearly and concisely, makes Lisa the sensible person to approach for young knights and alchemists with burning questions.
That is, provided they go and see her at an acceptable hour.
To visit during unacceptable hours — such as in the morning while Lisa is sleeping in, or in the afternoon while she's enjoying her tea — can spell disaster for unsuspecting visitors.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
When people meet Lisa for the first time, they often find themselves overawed by the famous alumnus of Sumeru Akademiya.
However, though her attitude to life may appear at first to be one of ruthless efficiency, it is in fact better understood as a product of her incorrigibly lazy nature, which drives her to avoid troublesome issues at all costs.
By negotiating with Kaeya, she offloaded the job of restocking and dispensing medication to Huffman and Swan, and had Flora start sending Donna over to deliver herbs on a daily basis.
The only tasks that Lisa handles personally are the categorization and management of books and other documents.
This is the one area where Lisa feels more comfortable handling the work herself rather than delegating it.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
When Lisa first joined the Knights of Favonius, the Grand Master sought to appoint her as Captain of the 8th Company.
This was much to the consternation of the company's Field Officer, Nymph, who resented the idea of an academic coming in at such a high-ranking position.
At Kaeya's suggestion, a practice combat session was arranged in which Lisa and Nymph would both display their magical proficiency.
Two minutes into the session, Lisa graciously declined the captaincy on the grounds that "Nymph manifestly possesses the requisite ability to fulfill the role."
For the whole year following, the Grand Master received a constant stream of referral letters from Nymph in relation to the captaincy, and the only person ever named in them was Lisa Minci.
Eventually, the Grand Master began turning over the referral letters to Lisa directly, but every time, Lisa would come up with an excuse to decline the offer.
Undoubtedly, the 8th Company would have been far stronger under her lead, but she deemed that such a level of power was not only superfluous to requirements, it would also be risky for her in a way that most people could never appreciate.
To be clear, Lisa is quite confident that she could handle any situation she came up against. However, additional danger means an additional workload — and that is something that she would never be able to accept.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Having personally witnessed raving-mad scholars in the forests of Sumeru and powerful sages sitting underutilized on advisory councils, Lisa realized what uninhibited erudition can really do to a person.
It seemed such a high price to pay... How much did one have to sacrifice to attain the profoundest knowledge of all?
Put off by this realization, Lisa decided to leave Sumeru.
Since then, Lisa has always stopped short of taking things too seriously.
"Before demanding too many miracles from the gods, first consider if you are willing to pay the price they ask."
These words she has spoken to just three people since arriving in Mondstadt. In each case, it was because she knew it was what they needed to hear.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
The Special Heating Cauldron is a purpose-built cauldron made to a design that no one in Mondstadt could understand. It features time-delay heating, semi-automated ingredient insertion, and temperature regulation functions.
Lisa spent an enormous budget and commandeered the alchemy workshop for two full weeks in order to build this extraordinary piece of equipment.
She boasts that the cauldron is capable of completing any precision heating task to perfection with a maximum of just two pulls of a lever.
But her most common application for it is to brew tea and keep it at the optimal temperature while she is managing her books.
After all, a relaxing afternoon tea session is by far the most important part of Lisa's day.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
A Vision is a sign from the gods: a sign that you are one of those whom they have chosen to change the world.
Or, maybe it's just one of the many hoops that one has to jump through on the path to unearthing the secrets of magecraft.
After all, understanding the elements is essential to the study of magic, and practical experience is a far more useful means of acquiring this understanding than trying to assimilate the knowledge contained in dusty old books.
"Hmm... I suppose I shall need a Vision, then."
And just like that, as that thought popped into her mind, her Vision popped into her hand.
With the aid of her Vision, Lisa acquired the knowledge that she sought. But she also sensed the deep secret hidden in the shadows of that knowledge.
For whatever reason, the gods gave humans the key to changing everything, but they did not explain the cost involved. Lisa grew fearful of the truth.
The Vision that hung from her neck became to her a bottomless pit filled with sweet delights, lingering at the back of her mind.
So, from time to time, when somebody whom she finds interesting comes along, Lisa will pass onto them her understanding on all kinds of matters.
Perhaps she is secretly hoping that by doing so, one day someone will come along who has the ability to understand the ultimate truth behind Visions.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Hi darling, are you going to be Lisa's little helper? What? Me, a grand mage? That was a long time ago, I'm just a humble librarian now. *chuckles* Don't worry darling, I'll take very good care of you. So...

voice.title: Chat: Afternoon Tea
voice.desc: It's nearly time for afternoon tea.

voice.title: Chat: Quest
voice.desc: Why not keep me company for a while... There'll be plenty of time for work later.

voice.title: Chat: Better to Stay In
voice.desc: Today's no good for going out... Hmm... Did I say that yesterday as well?

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: *sigh* Perfect weather for sipping a cup of tea while gazing out the window.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: When I practice my spells in weather like this, I can do half the work for double the impact. Haha, I'm just teasing.

voice.title: When It's Windy
voice.desc: Such a calming breeze... Perfect for taking a nap, don't you think?

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: *yawn* Good morning, Jean... Oh, it's you! Sorry, dear.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: It must almost be time for a nap...

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: You're still up? I'm getting sleepy...

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: I can see how hard you've been working today. Let me think of a way to reward you...

voice.title: About Lisa
voice.desc: I'm not lazy, I just know to save my energy for when I need it most.

voice.title: About Us: Relationships
voice.desc: I can be your teacher, your master, or your friend... or all three if you want...

voice.title: About Us: Capabilities
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Let me show you a thing or two, lest we let your efforts go to waste. *chuckles*

voice.title: About Us: Ceremony
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Wait, one last thing... A kiss on the forehead from master to follower. Now you're my star pupil.

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Visions? Ah, they're a necessary device in controlling the elements — with you being the sole exception, of course. Hmm... As for why that is, perhaps... we can find the time to experiment a little?

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: Feel free to use the alchemist's upstairs from the library whenever you want. But make sure you knock first... we wouldn't want you seeing anything you're not supposed to, now would we?

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: Calla Lilies are a medicinal flower with antidotal properties. With them in hand, there's no need to worry about the side effects of any potions... Hehe.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Jean is a gifted and dedicated leader. Seeing how hard she works makes even me want to help her out.

voice.title: About Amber
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Amber was just a young girl when she joined the knights, and in the blink of an eye, she's turned into such a strong young lady. I'm curious to see what she'll be like a few years from now.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Have you heard Barbara sing before? Her angelic voice contains a magical healing energy. A different kind of magical energy from the one in my potions, of course. I wonder which one you prefer?

voice.title: About Diluc
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You want to know about Diluc? Haha, in that case, I know someone else you should talk to.

voice.title: About Razor
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Come on Razor, that's it, good boy! Let's do some combat practice — I've found you the perfect partner. Hey! Come back!

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Last time little Klee wanted to use my workshop for her experiments, I had to say no, and she was angry at me for the rest of the day. *sigh* What happened the next day, you ask? She went off happily to play outside of course.

voice.title: About Mona
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Mona? She seems to be an excellent mage, but I'm not a part of their Hexenzirkel. The idea of Irminsul exploration and formal tea parties just leaves me cold.

voice.title: About Albedo
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Albedo is quite the alchemist. Just say the word and he'll come up with a good solution. He's easy on the eyes too, just like you.

voice.title: About Fischl
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Fischl, yes, she's always in the library looking to borrow fantasy novels. She always returns her books three days early and looks after them very well. She's a good kid.

voice.title: About Noelle
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Every time I ask Noelle to dust off the bookshelves, I'm always left with the sense that the more exhausted I make her, the happier she becomes. Yes, who knows what's going on with her... *chuckles*

voice.title: About Sucrose
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Try not to bother Sucrose if you're at a loose end, you'll only startle the poor girl. She's gifted at interacting with all sorts of exotic creatures — just hopeless when it comes to humans.

voice.title: About Cyno
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I've barely kept in touch with anyone from the Akademiya since leaving Sumeru, except for the occasional letters to my teachers out of basic courtesy. Fortunately, not every promising student turned out as lazy as I am... I heard that one of my juniors, Cyno, now leads quite the action-packed life.

voice.title: About Collei
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Ah, dear little Collei. Every time she writes to me, she tries out new words and expressions she's learned recently... Hehe, no wonder she's improving so quickly. That wonderful and warmhearted master of hers must have helped a lot too.

voice.title: About Mika
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I do rather envy Huffman for having such a caring little brother. Mika takes care of everything around the house and even looks after him when he's drunk... Ah, how nice it must be to lounge around all day without a care in the world... Hmm? What do you mean, I already do that? You're getting quite bold these days, aren't you, cutie?

voice.title: More About Lisa: I
voice.desc: So, which element would you like to learn about today?

voice.title: More About Lisa: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

My past? So, you want to get to know me a little better, huh? *chuckles* That's a story for another day. But I'm touched that you asked.

voice.title: More About Lisa: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

When I taught Razor how to utilize Elemental Energy, I never expected him to master the technique so quickly. Come to think of it, you're talented too. Maybe I could teach you a few tricks...

voice.title: More About Lisa: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

What's that? You want to learn some Sumeru Academia magic? I'm afraid it might be a bit too much for you to handle right now... Hmm, though I suppose it can't hurt to teach you some of the basics. Here, start by reading the beginner's guide, it's only 800 pages or so.

voice.title: More About Lisa: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

A Vision may seem like a great tool, but one day, the power one accumulates always finds a way to turn back on you. Should such a day come for me, so long as you're around... Ah, never mind.

voice.title: Lisa's Hobbies
voice.desc: Hey darling, would you like to try one of my magic potions? There's no knowing what it will do to you until you try it, though... Don't say I didn't warn you!

voice.title: Lisa's Troubles
voice.desc: The interrogation room upstairs has sat there unused for two years now... It would be a much more lively place if Hertha would agree to let me use it as my private workshop... *sigh* She's such a spoilsport.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I like making my own vegetable soup. I put a big bunch of vegetables into a cauldron and stir it with a long spoon. What does it taste like? Here, why don't you try it for yourself. Open wide!

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: I suffer from extreme pumpkinphobia. The fall harvest is a difficult time of year for me, as you can imagine. I wonder if it would be worth the trouble to make all the pumpkins in the world disappear...

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Oh aren't you just the sweetest? Thanks, cutie, you just made my day.

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Hehe, you've really got a knack for this, haven't you?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh my... This is really... hmm...

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Here, take this amulet, it will bring you good luck. It's my birthday gift to you. I spent a long time making it, so don't lose it now!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

Surely you don't want me working overtime... That would be no good.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

Chances to practice should be left to you newcomers, no?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

*chuckles* If I were to recover my full power, who knows what kind of things just might happen?

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

I've already tried to persuade you every way possible... *sigh* Have it your way, cutie. I can no longer go on pretending at this point — even a Hilichurl would see through the act. So be it, let me introduce you to the true Witch of Purple Rose.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: *giggles*

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: You're in for a little shock.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Come a little closer.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: ...Blitz!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: V
voice.desc: You've been a naughty boy!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: VI
voice.desc: Hehe~

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Let's spark things up a little.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: Surrender and I'll be gentle.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Try not to enjoy this too much.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: No pain no gain, haha...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Oh my...

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: What do you think, cutie?

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: I have some for you too.

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: I'm a bit rusty...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: Oh no, I'm gonna ruin my gloves.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: Don't force it, darling.

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Do you need me to lend a hand?

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Going out is tiring...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: Looks like I got carried away...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: I knew I should have stayed home...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ugh...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Don't be such a brute.

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Here, let me help you.

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: I'll keep an eye on you.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Ooh, you're taking me out?

value.name: Mysterious Bolognese
value.desc: Lisa's specialty. With an inexplicable aura, this bolognese is so exotic that you can never have enough. Did she actually enchant it with some kind of magic?

value.name: Lisa
value.desc:
"Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa

Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

videoCollection.title: Outfit Teaser: Teyvat Style – Flowers Between Pages | Genshin Impact

desc.text:
Oh, cutie, you're here. Come, sit.
How would you like to join me for some tea today?
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1270203970749960194

Oh, hello there, cutie! Right on time.
I'm just about to have some afternoon tea, come join me.
Is that... a birthday present for me?
In this case, I will prepare some special tea time snacks just for you.
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1402475541458997252

"I heard that the most important part of Lisa's day is a relaxing and pleasant afternoon tea session! Hey, Paimon, slow down! Wait for me—"
Twitter URL: https:/twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1402475542159368192

Hello, cutie, it's been a while~ What brought you here today?
If it's about work, then that's too bad, because I don't intend to work overtime today.
But looking at the flowers you're holding... Hehe, I think I know what's going on.
Well, why are you standing there? Come and enjoy afternoon tea with me~
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5314744

Hey cutie, what brings you here?
Oh, these... are herbs that you don't come across every day in Mondstadt.
Thank you, cutie. Seems like you know exactly how to delight me~
HoYoLAB Article: https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/5314741

Message
"To be clear, I don't like reading books. I borrowed "Along with Divinity" simply because I wanted to know the girl working at the library."
"The book is really hard. I wanted to borrow a book that was deep to show how smart I am, but..."
"And since I wasn't able to keep reading it, I simply put it down. I've been busy ever since, so I forgot about it. I haven't been to the library since then, and the book is most likely overdue."
"I just remembered yesterday, it's been due for over a week! Legend has it, whoever dares not return their books to the library will be struck by lightning. Let's just say I dare to go back even less."
Cat's Tail's reply
It sure seems like a serious issue. If you need a drink that will fill you with determination, we have exactly what you need at Cat's Tail, but...
May the Wind guide you.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Purple Rose
Lisa's outfit. A slim-fit dress adorned with roses that displays a young lady's elegance.

Obtained Outfit - A Sobriquet Under Shade
An outfit Lisa had someone commission for her when she revisited Sumeru. A perfect blend of practicality and elegance, the dress bears a resemblance to Lisa's old uniform from her Akademiya days.
Obtained Outfit #1 - A Sobriquet Under Shade
Obtained Outfit #1 - A Sobriquet Under Shade

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Valberry
materials.desc: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

materials.name: Lightning Prism
materials.desc:
An Electro Hypostasis channels nearby elemental energy to repair damaged elemental entities. Contains the essence of Electro energy.
An ordinary prism separates white light into its component colors; a Lightning Prism, however, channels flowing energies and weaves them into lightning. It will continue to do so even after the Electro Hypostasis has been defeated.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#ffacff>AoE Electro DMG</color> after a short casting time.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#ffacff>AoE Electro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.name: Slime Concentrate
materials.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

materials.name: Dvalin's Claw
materials.desc:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.
<color=#ffd780>Tap/Press</color>
Releases a homing Lightning Orb.
On hit, it deals <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.
<color=#ffd780>Hold</color>
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> .
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> throughout the ability's duration.
This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.
Hits by Charged Attacks apply <color=#ffd780>Violet Arc</color> 's Conductive status to opponents.
Opponents hit by <color=#ffd780>Lightning Rose</color> have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.
When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
